Description: Identify the intrinsic tongue muscles in a mid-sagittal section of the vocal tract.

Description: Based on X-ray microbeam data - can you guess the word?.

Description: Based on X-ray microbeam data - can you guess the word?.

Description: Modeling of the muscular-elastic and aerodynamic forces that are involved in phonation.

Description: Practice using key formulas to calculate aerodynamic properties of speech.
